messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!

i am searching for a 2 week trip in summer. i want to have some cities to visit and also nature stuff. i like it to be more cheap in terms of food etc. my budget is quite low. what would you recommend
Do you have any specific destinations in mind, or are you open to suggestions for cities and nature spots within a budget-friendly range?
outside europe, more budgetfriendly
Could you please provide the city you're departing from and your preferred departure date for the trip?
from Zurich, July 2026
Could you please specify a destination outside of Europe that you're considering for your trip?
i dont know
Here are some budget-friendly destinations outside of Europe that might interest you:
are the flight prices budget friendly too?

Flight prices can vary, but Lufthansa Group often offers competitive pricing. For destinations like Bali, Buenos Aires, and Chiang Mai, flights can be found within a budget-friendly range, especially when booked
yes, specifically argentina
Here are the flight options from Zurich to Buenos Aires, Argentina for your trip:
why is the second one more expensive

The second flight option is more expensive primarily because it includes an additional flight segment from Madrid (MAD) to Buenos Aires (EZE). This extra leg of the journey can involve different airlines, routes,
ok
You're welcome! If you need any more help with your travel planning or have any other questions, feel free to ask. I'm here to assist you with anything you need for your trip.
can you provide me other inspirations
Certainly! Here are some more travel inspirations that might interest you:
why portugal? it is in europe

but i didnt want in europe
